name: Delicious Blackberry Muffins
author: Bleuroze
summary: These moist muffins are a great way to turn fresh blackberries into a yummy breakfast treat. Also great with oatmeal crumb topping. In a pinch, these can be made with frozen berries that have been thawed and drained.
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Line a muffin tin with paper liners
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a large bowl
Whisk sour cream, butter, eggs, milk, and vanilla extract together in another bowl
Stir into the flour mixture until blended
Spoon batter into the muffin tin, filling each liner 2/3 full
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 18 to 20 minutes
